name: AA Defence
description:
Stationary Turret defence game for Oculus Quest 1.

Sink or fire! Try to master the controls in a ship mounted turret and take down as many of the incoming aircrafts as possible, in a hopeless battle to stay alive.

Credits:
Programmers:
Jacob Lundberg, Carl Erlandsson, Robert Sandh, Axel Eriksson

Artists:
Robin Ekström, Alice Persdotter Rydberg, Kristina Jönsson, Josefin Ramsberg, Mark Sinistaj, Ted Lai
